resources.string: Chemical Engineering Studentsâ€™ Association is a technical club of Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Pune. The Chemical Engineering Students Association (ChESA) was formed in the year 2007 with a view to bridging the gap between the classroom\'s theoretical academics and Industrial expectations from the students by means of a variety of Academic, Social, and Curricular Activities. The Club aims at the overall development of the students. \n\nChESA conducts various technical workshops, guest lectures, expert talks, Alumni Interactions, Industry visits, and also Extracurricular activities. It also promotes the culture of paper presentations, higher studies, jobs and placements, internships, and many more.
